How About us?

Sean Duncan

Sean loves three.js. What more is there to say? Sean has been building websites ever since he was five years old. Unlike ordinary children, as soon as Sean could read, he picked up books like 'How to Design a Website From the Ground Up' and 'Mastering Web Application Development with AngularJS' which he read all the day long. Years later, Sean is an accomplished web designer with much experience behind him.

Cade Ward

Cade is incredibly creative and can write like no-other. Be careful, when he writes about you he will take any liberty necessary to make you look good. Cade is in love with node.js and coding late into the night. He also loves cat gifs.
